translations: 对……进行插管治疗（intubate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The present study demonstrated that neuromuscular monitoring improved endotracheal intubating conditions.
sentences.translation: 本研究显示神经肌肉监测可改善插管条件。

sentences.sentence: Objective:To evaluate the role of the intubating laryngeal mask airway(ILMA) in cervical vertebra surgery.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨气管插管型喉罩通气道（ILMA）在颈椎手术中的应用价值。
